Description.0:
## Job Description

**Project Description:**

Who You Are  
• You can demonstrate experience in. A minimum of 5-10 years as a Technical
Architect/Consultant. You have excellent knowledge of various types of
technologies, deeply aware of new trends and new industry tech stacks. You
have experience leading technical teams, creating executive decks
independently and are well versed at presenting to executives. Experience
working with business and architecture teams to develop and design technology
solutions is essential to this role. Ideally, you have progressed through
application development, analysis and design Solid experience with a variety
of technologies/frameworks including event-driven architecture, REST APIs,
microservice architecture, CI/CD processes, DevOps pipelines, etc. Product &
Domain knowledge Fintech, digital banking, Payments, Foreign Exchange,
International Remittance would be a great asset.  
• You have a degree / diploma in : Computer Science, Engineering, Math,
Physics or Technical discipline; a Master's degree or a PHD would be an asset  
• You're driven to succeed. You are motivated by accomplishing your goals and
delivering your best to make an impact.  
• You're driven by collective success. You know that collaboration can
transform a good idea into a great one. You understand the power of an
inclusive team that enjoys working together to bring a shared vision to life.  
• You're digitally savvy. You seek out innovative solutions and embrace
evolving technologies. You can easily adapt to new tools and trends.  
• You understand that success is in the details. You notice things that others
don't. Your critical thinking skills help to inform your decision making.  
• You look beyond the moment. make decisions and take actions that will make a
difference today and tomorrow. You proactively seek new opportunities to
define what's possible.  
• Values matter to you. You bring your real self to work and you live our
values - trust, teamwork, and accountability.  
  
How You'll Succeed  
• Strong Leadership: Be a bold and authentic leader who is passionate about
developing and coaching to bring out the best in people.Direct, motivate,
develop and manage performance of the project delivery teams.  
• Strategic Development & Execution: Build technical solutions that take into
account enterprise vision, current state and opportunities to build a future
state of Personal Banking Products Technology for our Clients and Frontline.
Analyze the viability of the solution to meet product timelines, budget and
quality.  
• Relationship Management:. Collaborate with Business and Technology partners
to translate requirements to technical designs and act as the lead technical
authority.  
• Collaborative: Work with Business Stakeholders, Architecture, Technology,
and Product teams to ensure all aspects of the solution are defined in
conjunction with CIBC standards, policies, priorities and best practices.  
• Strong Communication: Working closely and interacting with business partners
and vendors reporting, negotiating and managing services, documenting and
presenting ideas and recommendations.  
  
What CIBC Offers  
At CIBC, our people are our greatest asset. You'll become part of a diverse
community that acknowledges everyone's unique talents and empowers teams to do
what's right for the client, and to do it well. As part of our team, you will:  
• Thrive: Benefit from an open and approachable culture that provides the
flexibility and support you need to integrate your life at work and at home  
• Connect: Work in a place where the right technology and infrastructure
fosters innovation, collaboration and creativity  
• Develop: Grow your skills and career through our best-in-class onboarding
experience, ongoing learning opportunities, and individual development
planning  
• Prosper: Share in our collective success with a competitive salary,
incentive pay, banking benefits, health benefits program, and employee share
purchase plan

**Responsibilities:**

What You'll Be Doing  
As a Solution Design Director, you will partner with business and technology
stakeholders to help define solution options for business ideas prior to
inception. You will primarily be responsible for the creation and
rationalization of solutions as well as the communication of the same to both
business and technology stakeholders and providing guidance to the delivery
teams for its implementation. In addition, your responsibilities extend to
leading the design practice within the team, improving the design process &
Artifacts, and providing training & guidance to other members of the team.
Other accountabilities include: creating the solution design for new
initiatives and contribute to the overall design strategy of the Alternative
Solutions Group and Simplii Financial line of business. As well as effectively
and accurately translating functional and non-functional business requirements
into technical solutions. This includes ensuring alignment of solution designs
with low level app designs, and creating reasonable interim solutions of the
various phases/workstreams, while considering the desired overall target state
outcomes including ease of on-going support. Additionally, you will be
accountable for remediating any design and build issues that may arise.

**Mandatory Skills Description:**

Architectural Design, Cloud Architecture, Microservices

**Nice-to-Have Skills:**

DevOps, REST API
Description.2:
## Job Description

**Senior iOS Developer**  
  
Job Description  
  
Are you looking to join a dedicated company that's proven its software is not
only made to last, but to thrive in a constantly evolving market? Their mobile
apps, at the core of these critical workflows, are powered by reliable,
scalable, resilient distributed systems that reach people all across the
world.  
  
Required Skills & Experience  

  * 2+ years experience as a technical lead or managing engineering teams
  * 5+ years experience developing and supporting software in a production environment
  * 5+ years experience programming in object oriented languages such as Swift or Objective C

  
Desired Skills & Experience  

  * 3+ years experience developing and supporting scalable, distributed backend services
  * 3+ years experience working with databases

  
What you will be doing  

  * 100% Hands on

  
The Offer  

  * Benefits (Medical, Dental, Vision)
  * 4 weeks of vacation

  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future. Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the
hiring process as required under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation
policy. Applicants need to make their needs known in advance.
Description.3:
## Job Description

Service providers urgently need a streamlined way to manage their 5G networks
and launch new services at the click of a button, and my client is building
it!  
  
My client and its' operator partners lead the way with this jointly developed
commercial production deployment that will accelerate network innovation and
simplify operations of the transformed, modernized network.  
  
Are you dynamic, curious, and excited about automation, 5G network evolution,
and cloud technology? Are you willing to learn and to teach? If yes, come tune
your skills to develop the next state-of-the-art open-source network
automation system!  
  
**Contract Duration:** 6-18 months, able to extend or convert to a FT employee
at 6 months  
Required Skills & Experience  
Bachelor's degree in Science/IT/Computing or equivalent  
  
• Minimum 10 years of experience in software engineering and at least 5 years
of experience in QA automation development.  
  
• Strong understanding of:  
  
o Python  
  
o Troubleshooting, debugging, and root cause analysis  
  
o Cloud native and micro-services software architecture (and RESTful APIs)  
  
o Networking, and have experience with networking software, protocols or
models (e.g. ONAP, Openstack, YANG, TOSCA, HEAT, Netconf, SNMP, CLI, BGP)  
  
• Experience with:  
  
o Wireless networks, 5G standalone Core, network slicing, and RAN.  
  
o Kubernetes and Docker, understanding container orchestration  
  
o Networking, understanding concepts of SDN, understand how code and
networking interact  
  
o Test planning, looking for edge cases, understanding design specifications
and deriving test cases  
  
o Working with Agile Scrum teams  
  
• Responsible for the design and development of automation flows in an
effective manner  
  
• Good understanding of Network Function Virtualization and network automation
principles  
  
• Exposure to microservices architecture  
  
• Open to testing manually (as required)  
  
• Familiarity with devOps principles, CI/CD pipeline, working with GitLab,
Jenkins, Gerrit  
Desired Skills & Experience  
• Robot test automation  
  
• ONAP experience is an asset  
  
• Selenium UI Web driver  
  
• Test framework development  
What You Will Be Doing  
• You will work with software engineers and other architects to define and
refine the solution to align with the business, development, deployment, and
maintenance needs.  
  
• You will collaborate with the Product Owner and the Scrum Master to manage
the team backlog.  
  
• You will be a key technical contributor, owning stories and designing,
developing, and supporting test automation  
  
• You will research, evaluate, and prototype new methodologies, technologies,
and products, you will propose and follow through with improvements in
processes and tools.  
The Offer  
You will receive the following benefits:  

  * Statutory Vacation

  
  
#LI-AL1
Description.4:
## Job Description

**Senior Android Developer**  
  
**Job Description**  
  
My client is relied upon by governments and trusted agencies across the world.
They build security technology that makes it possible for millions of
individuals, and government agencies to secure data. With offices in around
the world, they're eager to take on new employees to grow and strengthen their
team today!  
  
**Required Skills & Experience**  

  * Design and implement scalable systems and infrastructures.
  * Continuous improvement of foundational components in the dimensions of configurability and quality.
  * Measure work thoroughly, analyze results, and generate hypothesis to drive new product changes through A/B testing.
  * Setup monitoring and testing of your APIs and services to better understand real time health of your products.

  
**Desired Skills & Experience**  

  * Experience working on a team with large amount of ownership and responsibility for managing things directly.
  * Great understanding of designing highly scalable and performant micro-services and storage layers using common frameworks, languages and cloud infrastructure. (e.g Java, Kotlin, AWS.)
  * Strong background in testing/quality mindset with clear design solutions.
  * Data-driven and strongly motivated by success and learnings through experiments and metrics analysis.

  
**The Offer**  

  * RSU's (as it's a publicly traded stock)
  * 10% yearly bonus
  * Fully remote from anywhere in Canada
  * Unlimited access to any of Coursera's courses, and up to 10 free courses for friends and family per year

  
  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future.
Description.6:
## Job Description

**Project Description:**

Our Client is on a mission to build the relationship-focused bank of the
future and we're looking for the passionate collaborators, innovators,
advisors, and leaders who can get us there.  
We specialize in custom development and vendor packages with domain knowledge
in Capital Markets and Treasury.  
Currently we are working on modernizing a trading platform and moving to micro
services architecture.  
  
Who You Are  
• You can demonstrate experience with: 6+ years in C/C++, GoLang, Swagger and
payment systems with a deep knowledge on financial protocols (e.g. ISO8583,
VISA Net, MasterCard, CUP) and experience of designing system to system
integrations. It is an asset if your have good knowledge on development design
patterns and best practices. Prior experience in cloud technologies (like
docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and Azure). Designing and building scalable
production quality REST APIs. Excellent knowledge of version control (e.g.
github) and build tools (e.g. Jenkins). Operating with minimal supervision and
performing moderate to difficult technical tasks independently Knowledge of
Dynatrace is a plus.  
• You have a degree/diploma in computer science, computer engineering or a
related discipline.  
• You embrace and champion change. You'll continuously evolve your thinking
and the way you work in order to deliver your best.  
• Your influence makes an impact. You know that relationships and networks are
essential to success. You inspire outcomes by making yourself heard.  
• You're digitally savvy. You seek out innovative solutions and embrace
evolving technologies. You can easily adapt to new tools and trends.  
• You're driven by collective success. You know that collaboration can
transform a good idea into a great one. You understand the power of an
inclusive team that enjoys working together to create a shared vision.  
• Values matter to you. You bring your real self to work and you live our
values - trust, teamwork, and accountability.

**Responsibilities:**

How You'll Succeed  
• Design and Development - Perform and coordinate complex application
programming activities. Design the application's technical infrastructure
using specific databases, programming languages, utilities, and testing
approaches. Lead the design and development of cost-effective and innovative
solutions.  
• Strategic Planning - Develop multi-year technology roadmaps that align with
the bank's vision, strategy, and business objectives. Lead multiple complex
projects involving backend systems, new technology, and the enhancement of
existing applications. Working with Project Managers, Business, BA, and other
stakeholders to contribute to detailed project plans based on agreed upon
project priorities.  
• Accountability - Accountable for tracking individual change request life
cycle from scope through deployment. (Participate in all SDLC phases)  
• Leadership Skills - Act as development team lead and run code-review
sessions with the wider team to ensure the project is on track to meet
objectives. Support and mentor intermediate and senior developers by sharing
knowledge, collaborating and problem solving.

**Mandatory Skills Description:**

C/C++, financial protocols (e.g. ISO8583, VISA Net, MasterCard, CUP), github

**Nice-to-Have Skills:**

Golang, cloud technologies (like docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and Azure), REST
API, Dynatrace
Description.7:
## Job Description

A new and upcoming cyber security company that has a mission to create a world
where we can trust our technology is looking for you! This position is based
in Toronto, ON but is a full-time, 100% remote opportunity! This company is
recognized for their performance based monthly recognitions and unlimited
ability for career development.  
  
If you are looking to be a part of an innovative industry with a team that is
ready and willing to learn and listen while advancing day-to-day technology,
then you are in luck! The environment will be an excellent fit for an engineer
who works best in a fast-paced, constantly evolving and friendly workspace!
They are looking for someone who wants to help solve for success and are
always ready and will learn and take on a new opportunity! Working with this
company means you will have the immediate opportunity to make a positive
impact on the software and hardware security by working with industry leaders
and agencies.  
  
What you will be doing:  

  * Advocate and analyze all current DevOps technology within the company
  * You will be a critical part of the team that integrates, deploys and support all platforms for their enterprise customers.
  * Always improving all cloud-related monitoring, troubleshooting, configuration etc.
  * Work with and learn from a team of experts in automation, scaling and operations.
  * 70% Hands On
  * 30% Team collaboration

  
Required Skills & Experience:  

  * 5+ years of experience in a DevOps role or a software development role with a DevOps flavor
  * 2+ years of experience working with Kubernetes with creating & maintaining Helm charts.
  * 2+ years of experience in operations, administering Linux based systems.
  * Intermediate experience with scripting languages: Python and bash

  
You will receive the following benefits:  

  * Unlimited Vacation
  * Holiday Pay
  * Tailored Benefits

  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future.
Description.8:
## Job Description

**Overview: **

TekWissen Group is a workforce management provider throughout the USA and many
other countries in the world. Our client is a company who is a provider of
banking and financial services. The company operates through two divisions,
Retail Banking and Services, and Corporate and Institutional Banking.

 **Job Description:**

 **Training and Experience Requirements:**

  * Bachelor’s degree or foreign education equivalent experience in Computer Sciences or Engineering 

  * A minimum of 5 years supporting complex distributed systems in a similar environment like banking or telecoms+ years of experience in supporting IT systems. 

  * Basic knowledge of Rates, Credit, and FX instruments 

**Role Specific Requirements and Experience:**

  * An excellent communicator with French/ English spoken and written to a very high level is essential. You should be comfortable speaking with internal and external groups as well as business-side colleagues and clients 

  * Autonomous. Must own issues and use initiative to resolve and drive problems to completion without constant management 

  * Working closely with engineering and development teams to address repetitive issues, reduce operational effort and future service disruptions 

  * Full-stack application support experience – OS, network, middleware, database and application knowledge, and troubleshooting experience 

  * Knowledge of automation and systems monitoring, ideally with AutoSys and either Geneos or Dynatrace 

  * ITIL knowledge and processes with certification a plus 

  * Superior attention to detail and accuracy 

  * Whilst this is a team-based role, there is an opportunity to push for a team leadership position if the candidate has the desire and demonstrates the willingness 

  * The role shares an 8-hour shift with a colleague. Time can be arranged flexibly between the two team members. The shift pattern is 8am-5pm or 10am-7pm. Currently, the role is 80% home-based, but in time will transition to 50% remote and 50% office-based at our recently refurbished offices in downtown Montreal. There is no on-call and the expectation is that a few weekend days over the year are required (And compensated) to cover disaster recovery exercises. 

**Culture:**

  * Focus on the needs of the business 

  * Act with integrity, accepting responsibility for actions 

  * Recognize opportunities for creativity and development of processes 

  * Achieve a sensible work/life balance. 

**Tek Wissen® Group is an equal opportunity/affirmative action Employer
(m/f/d/v) supporting workforce diversity.**
Description.10:
## Job Description

Job Description  
  
**Software Engineer**  
  
**Summary Of Day-To-Day Responsibilities:**

  * Our Client is are seeking candidates for the position of IT Operations Specialist/Development Engineer within our team to support the our client Wealth Technology Solution teams. 
  * As part of this team, the candidate will work alongside other project team members (DevOps and Application Release Engineers, Business analysts, Developers, QA) and will specialize in: 
  * The Software Engineer will be developing and maintaining technical capabilities to support agile product development, including automated builds, automated infrastructure and application deployments, automated testing. 
  * Coordinating technical changes across teams for successful and timely delivery of projects. 
  * Triaging and escalating issues where necessary to ensure a high level of service maintained. 
  * Following the industry's best practices and our client standards. 
  * The Software Engineer will be supporting and managing project application environments. 
  * Actively contribute to the team's effectiveness and positive work environment, team's internal Practices & Processes. 
  * Actively participate in proof-of-concept efforts and actively seek and propose solutions to improve technical delivery and removal of tech debt. 
  * Prioritize and manage own workload to meet delivery dates. 
  * Be proficient in tools and processes required for developing and delivering software solutions. 
  * The Software Engineer will identify opportunities to improve service delivery and support process improvement initiatives. 
  * Assist in analysis, testing, and implementation of business solutions. 

  
**Must Have:**

  * Prior experience: focusing on continuous integration, infrastructure deployments, application code packaging and deployments, and test automation - 4 years 
  * Experience with Java, JBoss: 5 years 
  * Ability to install and maintain databases within Cloud Platforms preferably Azure: 3 years 
  * Working experience with MongoDB and Cassandra, including the ability to troubleshooting with the tools - Nice to Have 
  * Prior development experience in, NodeJS,.NET (NICE TO HAVE): 3 years 
  * Experience with configuration management, and containerization solutions tools such as Salt and Openshift (Nice to Have): 2 years 
  * Strong scripting skills in Bash, Python, PowerShell, YAML: 2 year 

  
**About The Company:**  
As a top 10 North American bank, our client aims to stand out from its peers
by having a differentiated brand - anchored in a proven business model and
rooted in a desire to give its customers, communities, and colleagues the
confidence to thrive in a changing world.  
  
Our client engages in providing financial products and services. They offer
various financial products and services, as well as telephone, Internet, and
mobile banking services, retail and commercial banking services, as well as
wealth management services. The Wholesale Banking segment provides capital
markets, investment banking, corporate banking products, and investment needs
to companies, governments, and institutions in financial markets.  
#Tech  
#LI-Remote  
#LI-GW1
Description.15:
## Job Description

**QA MANAGER**  
  
Our client is looking for a driven and dedicated Software QA manager to build
and manage a team testing new Real Estate Software applications. As a member
of our fast-paced group, you will have the unique and special opportunity to
lead and take part in new projects and help shape upcoming products that
inspire and delight millions in the Real Estate industry today.  
  
**Key Qualifications**  

  * Significant management experience. Ideally 5-10 years as a Software Quality Assurance manager
  * Established pattern of building strong teams - attracting, hiring, motivating, and retaining the best engineers
  * Great Knowledge of software development lifecycle, testing methodologies, QA terminology and processes
  * Persistent and inquisitive problem solver, committed to driving quality forward
  * Exceptional organizational and communication skills (oral, written and interpersonal) including the ability to communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience
  * Tremendous cross-functional influencer
  * Knowledge of Java, Selenium, Garden.io, BrowserStack is a plus
  * 5-10 years project management experience or experience leading large scale transformational, global change

  
  
**Perks**  

  * Competitive Salary
  * Benefits
  * Vacation

  
  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future. Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the
hiring process as required under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation
policy. Applicants need to make their needs known in advance.
Description.16:
## Job Description

Job Description  
  
**Senior Systems Administrator**  
  
**Job Summary** :

  * Senior Role - Automation of deployment of ESXi clusters, and VMWare to create new VMs, Upgrades & troubleshooting Private Cloud Infrastructure issues, working with vendors to resolve HRDW issues. 

  
**Job Responsibilities** :

  * The Senior Systems Administrator will monitor and resolve incidents related to infrastructure systems and applications 
  * Initiate corrective actions to resolve system and infrastructure application errors. 
  * Log and document production problems, identify recurring problems, and recommend preventative measures. 
  * Answer calls from application support groups or systems engineers, identify problems and resolve or escalate as required. 
  * The Senior Systems Administrator interacts with systems programmers, server, database, and network support staff to maintain responsive and available infrastructure for the application 

  
**Required Skills** :

  * Extensive experience deploying & Upgrading ESXi clusters in VMware Infrastructure and on UCS servers, and related components (e.g. UCS central, Service Profile, FI configuration).- 5 years 
  * (Powershell, CLI, Python, Javascript, etc.). 
  * Extensive experience with VMWare and related technologies and components such as vRealize Automation (VRA7, VRA8), vRealize Operations (VRO), vCenter, NSX micro-segmentation - 5 years 
  * (project to host new VMs). 
  * Extensive knowledge of Powershell and/or Python scripting tools and automation practices - 5 years 
  * Extensive knowledge of vRA and vCenter - 5 years 
  * Knowledge of NSX micro-segmentation - 2 years 
  * Knowledge with Service Now or similar tools used for Change Management & CMDB as well as Automation. 
  * Knowledge of UNIX systems management, servers, AIX/Client-UX, UNIX systems, and support and diagnostic tools such as Openview or VERITAS, shell scripts, etc 
  * Exposure to multiple UNIX based operating systems is an asset 

  
**Nice to Nice** :

  * Linux/Windows Server deployment automation 
  * Network and FW background 
  * Worked or have exposure to Audit findings & VMware Infrastructure Non Compliance/Troubleshooting and Remediation. 
  * Understanding Network/Infrastructure Designs 

  
**Note** :

  * VMware infrastructure build and deployment experience of 5 years minimum, 
  * Exposure to UCS servers & UCS Central, 
  * Automation experience using PowerShell or Python of 5+ years, 
  * Open to other large enterprise industries, this is a System Engineer role 

  
**About the Company** :

  * As a top 10 North American bank, our client aims to stand out from its peers by having a differentiated brand - anchored in a proven business model and rooted in a desire to give its customers, communities, and colleagues the confidence to thrive in a changing world. 
  * Our client engages in providing financial products and services. They offer various financial products and services, as well as telephone, Internet, and mobile banking services, retail and commercial banking services, as well as wealth management services. The Wholesale Banking segment provides capital markets, investment banking, corporate banking products, and investment needs to companies, governments, and institutions in financial markets. 

#tech  
#LI-GW1  
#LI-Remote
